Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)

play

public int play(UNO_Card card,
                boolean useColorInstead)
The play method plays the first card in the hand that can be played given the card passed to the method.

Specified by:
play in class Player
Parameters:
card - The top card on the discard pile.
useColorInstead - If true this flag indicates that the player should query the dealer for the current color and use this information instead of card on top of the draw pile to make their play. If false, use the card passed via the card parameter as the top card on the draw pile.
Returns:
The number of cards remaining in the players hand after the player object has played.

scoreOnCards

public int scoreOnCards()
The scoreOnCards method reports the score of the cards in the player's hand. It should only be called after a game has been one. The score should be calculated using standard UNO scoring rules.

Specified by:
scoreOnCards in class Player
Returns:
The value of the cards in the player's hand when the method is called.

selectCard2Play

public UNO_Card selectCard2Play(UNO_Card topCard)
Returns the first playable card encountered in the hand. Cards are checked in the order color, action, and number. Wild cards are immediately selected If no playable card is found, the method returns a null Uno_Card.

Parameters:
topCard - The top card on the discard pile, which must be played against.
Returns:
The card to play or null if no card in the hand can be played.

selectCardByColor

public UNO_Card selectCardByColor(int color)

whoAreYou

public String whoAreYou()
The whoAreYou method reports the player object's name.

Specified by:
whoAreYou in class Player
